word: With authority He bade the unclean spirits come out of them. His words penetrated the darkened minds of the unfortunate men. .. . A marvelous change had come over the demoniacs. Light had shone into their minds. Their eyes beamed with intelligence. The countenances, so long deformed into the image of Satan, became suddenly mild, the bloodstained hands were quiet, and with glad voices the men praised God for their deliverance. . . .
